content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 28}, 
a wooden chest at position(40.5, -83.5) with an inventory of {'coal': 30}, 
and another wooden chest at position(41.5, -83.5) with an empty inventory.

### Coal Transport System at position(39.5, -81.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(39.5, -81.5) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 22}, 
connected to the coal mine at position(41.0, -82.0).

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 20} and 
an empty furnace source inventory.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the item you are trying to insert in your inventory before attempting insertion.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing mining.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.

### NAMESPACE
* Important variables:
  + `coal_chest`: a wooden chest entity
  + `furnace`: a stone furnace entity
  + `drill`: a burner mining drill entity
  + `inserter`: a burner inserter entity
* Utility functions:
  + `extract_item`: extracts an item from a chest (failed when chest did not contain the item)
  + `insert_item`: inserts an item into a furnace (failed when no item to insert from inventory)
  + `get_entity_status`: gets the status of an entity (e.g. working, waiting for source items, no ingredients)
